subject: Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Doping (Sports)
Horse Racing
United States Politics and Government
organizations: Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
lead_paragraph: Eight prominent members of the racing industry told a Senate committee that trainers should be banned for life if they are found to have used potent performance-enhancing drugs.
snippet: Eight prominent members of the racing industry told a Senate committee that trainers should be banned for life if they are found to have used potent performance-enhancing drugs.
